title: OpenAI strikes deal on $4.6 bil AI center in Australia
description: ChatGPT maker OpenAI and an Australian data center operator have agreed to develop a multibillion-dollar AI center in Sydney. Brisbane-headquartered NextDC said it signed a memorandum of understanding with OpenAI to develop an artificial intelligence campus and a "supercluster" of graphics processing units. title: Jamie Dimon predicts AI will benefit mankind if properly regulated
description: Jamie Dimon told Fox News' Maria Bartiromo on Sunday that artificial intelligence will likely create more jobs "in the short run" given the technology is properly regulated.
content:
JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon offered an optimistic outlook on artificial intelligence (AI), predicting the technology will not "dramatically reduce" jobs over the next year — provided it is properly regulated.

title: Revamping India's Education with Tradition and Innovation: A Bold Vision
description: Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan outlined the National Education Policy's (NEP-2020) aim to integrate Indian ethos into education, leveraging artificial intelligence. He emphasized Madhya Pradesh's role in retaining cultural continuity and highlighted the necessity for community involvement, skill development, and educational accountability to position India globally.

title: There's a new face in Hollywood, generated by AI
description: Tilly Norwood is unlike any other aspiring TV or movie star: Tilly is entirely generated by artificial intelligence. What might that mean for the media industry?
